description: Invasion was a 5 player PvE mode on a brand new series of maps. Form a squad of your favourite Star Guardians and, alongside your friends, defend the city from a series of monster attacks.
name: Star Guardian Gamemode

description: Mana Potion was a consumable item in League of Legends.
name: Mana Potion

description: Nemesis Draft is a Featured Game Mode for League of Legends in which every player picks a champion for the opposing team.
name: Nemesis Draft

description: Dominion was a game mode in League of Legends in a 5v5 format on the Crystal Scar centering around objective control.
name: Dominion

description: It was a Field of Justice designed for the Dominion game mode.
name: Crystal Scar

description: The Snowdown Summoner's Rift was replaced by a 'Winter' seasonal variant that includes many holiday elements.
name: Winter Summoner's Rift

description: Twisted Treeline was the second classic gameplay map for League of Legends. It typically featured faster, bloodier matches with an emphasis on ganking and small-scale skirmishes.
name: Twisted Treeline
Dark Star: Singularity
description: Dark Star Singularity was a 3v3 match where you play as Thresh, the Chain Warden. It was a quick mode played on the map Cosmic Ruins taking place in outer space.

name: Odyssey: Extraction
description: Odyssey: Extraction was a temporary game mode released for the Odyssey event.
Deathfire Grasp was a legendary item in League of Legends.
name: Deathfire Grasp
League Displays
description: League Displays was an application that made it possible for you to set desktop backgrounds using LoL splasharts and other arts from the game

name: Web Match History
description: The Web Match history was a service showing you a match history of your games. With the shutdown of the LegS API it got turned off too.

name: LegS API
description: LegS the abbreviation for Legendary Stats was the service powering League's match history after Riot created multiple games they also created a new match history system called GAMHS which in 2021 replaced the years old LegS system.

name: Ao Shin
description: Ao Shin was a dragon champion teased back in 2013. Riot finally made Aurelion Sol. Enventually, Ao Shin has been added to TFT as a champion.

name: League of Legends Boards
description: League of Legends forum were replaced by other community tools like Reddit, Discord and Twitter to discuss about the game.

name: Sewn Chaos Amumu and Blitzcrank
description: Sewn Chaos Amumu and Blitzcrank were deeemed to low quality to be added to live server.

name: Oceanic Pro League
description: The Oceanic Pro League (OPL) was the top-level of professional League of Legends competition in Oceania.Riot Games announced the dissolution of the OPL on 7 October 2020, citing operation costs and failures to reach company-set goals.
